articles.title: Head of rights group during Argentina’s military dictatorship dies at 93
articles.description: Hebe de Bonafini co-founded Mothers of the Plaza de Mayo in 1977 after her two sons were arrested and then disappeared
articles.content:
Hebe de Bonafini, who became a human rights campaigner when her two sons were arrested and then disappeared under Argentina’s military dictatorship has died, her family and authorities have reported. She was 93.

articles.description: Hebe de Bonafini, who became a human rights campaigner when her two sons were arrested and disappeared under Argentina's military dictatorship, died Sunday, her family and authorities reported. She was 93.

articles.title: Hebe de Bonafini, the mother who defied Argentina's dictatorship, dies at 93
articles.description: Hebe de Bonafini, the iconic co-founder of Argentina's Mothers of Plaza de Mayo and a staunch fighter against the human rights violations committed during the country's military dictatorship in the 1970s and 1980s, died on Sunday at the age of 93.
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES, Nov 20 (Reuters) - Hebe de Bonafini, the iconic co-founder of Argentina's Mothers of Plaza de Mayo and a staunch fighter against the human rights violations committed during the country's military dictatorship in the 1970s and 1980s, di... [2331 chars]

articles.title: Mike Tyson Was a Die-Hard Fan of Lionel Messi in 2014 Before Argentina Loss to Germany in FIFA World Cup Finals
articles.description: Mike Tyson loved watching Lionel Messi play football on the field. In 2014, Tyson rooted for Argentina as they competed in Brazil.
articles.content:

articles.title: Soccer-Holding back for fear of injury is not the way to go, says Poland's Bereszynski
articles.description: "Each of us gives their best in friendlies and in training, to make sure that they're the ones who make the lineup, for example in Tuesday's match." Poland kick off their World Cup campaign on Tuesday against Mexico, and face Saudi Arabia and Argentina in their other Group C games.
articles.content:
Poland defender Bartosz Bereszynski does not hold back in training for fear of getting injured and tries not to think too much about the possibility of that happening, he said on Sunday.
France striker and Ballon d'Or winner Karim Benzema is the late... [1581 chars]

articles.title: Messi practises sparingly away from the Argentina team
articles.description: Three days before Argentina's World Cup opening against Saudi Arabia, Lionel Messi participated in some light training away from his Argentina teammates on Saturday, leading some supporters to believe he may be injured.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi participated in some light training away from his Argentina
Messi and a few other players remained in the gym rather than attending main training
Argentina will also compete against Mexico and Poland
